description.value: Your rapid or forceful words draw the enemy's attention away from your hands long enough to chamber another bullet. Interact to reload and then attempt a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Create a Diversion]{Create a Diversion} or an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize}.
